languages.text: {n}Улыбка старшины становится чуть менее искренней. Он обшаривает глазами ряды своих подчиненных, а затем вздыхает:{/n} "Обычно мимо нас даже крыса не проскользнет, Ваша Светлость! Но вы человек непростой, особенных талантов. Не смею осуждать — прошли, значит, надо было".

{n}The foreman's smile becomes a little less sincere. His searching eyes wander over the ranks of his subordinates. Then, he sighs.{/n} "Normally, not even a rat can get past us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But you are no ordinary person. You possess special talents. I dare not judge. If you got in, you must have had a reason to."
languages.original_text: {n}Улыбка старшины становится чуть менее искренней. Он обшаривает глазами ряды своих подчиненных, а затем вздыхает:{/n} "Обычно мимо нас даже крыса не проскользнет, Ваша Светлость! Но вы человек непростой, особенных талантов. Не смею осуждать — прошли, значит, надо было".

I dare not judge; if you got in, you must have had a reason to."

Then, he sighs.{/n} "Normally, not even a rat can get past us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But you are no ordinary person. You possess special talents. I dare not judge. If you got in, you must have had a reason to."

languages.text: {n}Das Lächeln des Vorarbeiter wirkt nicht mehr ganz so aufrichtig. Sein suchender Blick wandert durch die Reihen seiner Untergebenen. Dann seufzt er.{/n} "Normalerweise kommt nicht einmal eine Ratte an uns vorbei, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Aber Ihr seid keine gewöhnliche Person. Ihr besitzt besondere Talente. Ich wage nicht, mir ein Urteil zu erlauben. Wenn Ihr hineingekommen seid, musstet Ihr einen Grund dafür haben."
languages.original_text: {n}The foreman's smile becomes a little less sincere. His searching eyes wander over the ranks of his subordinates. Then, he sighs.{/n} "Normally, not even a rat can get past us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But you are no ordinary person. You possess special talents. I dare not judge. If you got in, you must have had a reason to."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Lächeln des Vorarbeiter wirkt nicht mehr ganz so aufrichtig. Sein suchender Blick wandert durch die Reihen seiner Untergebenen. Dann seufzt er.{/n} "Normalerweise kommt nicht einmal eine Ratte an uns vorbei, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Aber Ihr seid keine gewöhnliche Person. Ihr besitzt besondere Talente. Ich wage nicht, mir ein Urteil zu erlauben. Wenn Ihr hineingekommen seid, musstet Ihr einen Grund dafür haben."

languages.text: {n}Le sourire du contremaître perd de sa sincérité. Ses yeux scrutateurs balaient les rangs de ses subalternes, puis il pousse un soupir.{/n} « En temps normal, pas même un rat ne pourrait tromper notre vigilance, Votre Seigneurie ! Mais vous n'êtes pas une personne ordinaire. Vous possédez des talents très particuliers et je n'oserais pas vous juger. Si vous avez décidé d'y entrer, vous aviez probablement une bonne raison. »
languages.original_text: {n}The foreman's smile becomes a little less sincere. His searching eyes wander over the ranks of his subordinates. Then, he sighs.{/n} "Normally, not even a rat can get past us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But you are no ordinary person. You possess special talents. I dare not judge. If you got in, you must have had a reason to."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sourire du contremaître perd de sa sincérité. Ses yeux scrutateurs balaient les rangs de ses subalternes, puis il pousse un soupir.{/n} « En temps normal, pas même un rat ne pourrait tromper notre vigilance, Votre Seigneurie ! Mais vous n'êtes pas une personne ordinaire. Vous possédez des talents très particuliers et je n'oserais pas vous juger. Si vous avez décidé d'y entrer, vous aviez probablement une bonne raison. »

languages.text: {n}领班的笑容变得有些僵硬。他扫视着周围的属下，之后叹了口气。{/n}“通常情况下，就连老鼠都别想从我们身边溜进去，大人！不过，您可不是普通人。您拥有过人的才能，我不敢妄加评判。既然您进入了隔离区，那您这么做肯定是有原因的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The foreman's smile becomes a little less sincere. His searching eyes wander over the ranks of his subordinates. Then, he sighs.{/n} "Normally, not even a rat can get past us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But you are no ordinary person. You possess special talents. I dare not judge. If you got in, you must have had a reason to."

traits.locale_text: {n}领班的笑容变得有些僵硬。他扫视着周围的属下，之后叹了口气。{/n}“通常情况下，就连老鼠都别想从我们身边溜进去，大人！不过，您可不是普通人。您拥有过人的才能，我不敢妄加评判。既然您进入了隔离区，那您这么做肯定是有原因的。”

languages.text: {n}La sonrisa del capataz pierde parte de su sinceridad. Sus ojos buscan con sagacidad entre las filas de sus subordinados. Después, suspira.{/n} «¡Normalmente, no puede pasar ni una rata sin nuestro conocimiento, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Pero usted no es una persona corriente: cuenta con talentos especiales. No osaría juzgarl{mf|e|a}. Si ha entrado, debía tener un motivo para hacerlo».
languages.original_text: {n}The foreman's smile becomes a little less sincere. His searching eyes wander over the ranks of his subordinates. Then, he sighs.{/n} "Normally, not even a rat can get past us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But you are no ordinary person. You possess special talents. I dare not judge. If you got in, you must have had a reason to."

traits.locale_text: {n}La sonrisa del capataz pierde parte de su sinceridad. Sus ojos buscan con sagacidad entre las filas de sus subordinados. Después, suspira.{/n} «¡Normalmente, no puede pasar ni una rata sin nuestro conocimiento, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Pero usted no es una persona corriente: cuenta con talentos especiales. No osaría juzgarl{mf|e|a}. Si ha entrado, debía tener un motivo para hacerlo».

languages.text: {n}作業長の笑みから少し真摯さが失せた。探るような視線が配下たちに注がれる。そして、彼はため息をついた。{/n}「通常ならネズミ1匹も私共の目を逃れて通ることはありませんよ、陛下！ですがあなたは普通の方ではありません。特別な力をお持ちです。私はとやかく言うつもりはありません。侵入されたというなら、そうする理由があったのでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The foreman's smile becomes a little less sincere. His searching eyes wander over the ranks of his subordinates. Then, he sighs.{/n} "Normally, not even a rat can get past us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But you are no ordinary person. You possess special talents. I dare not judge. If you got in, you must have had a reason to."

traits.locale_text: {n}作業長の笑みから少し真摯さが失せた。探るような視線が配下たちに注がれる。そして、彼はため息をついた。{/n}「通常ならネズミ1匹も私共の目を逃れて通ることはありませんよ、陛下！ですがあなたは普通の方ではありません。特別な力をお持ちです。私はとやかく言うつもりはありません。侵入されたというなら、そうする理由があったのでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Ustabaşının tebessümü solarken bakışları astlarının üzerinde geziniyor, kendisi de iç çekiyor.{/n} "Normalde bizim gözetimimizden bir fare bile kaçamaz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Ama siz sıradan değilsiniz, özel hünerleriniz var. Hüküm vermek bana düşmez. İçeri girebildiyseniz mutlaka haklı bir sebebiniz vardır."
languages.original_text: {n}The foreman's smile becomes a little less sincere. His searching eyes wander over the ranks of his subordinates. Then, he sighs.{/n} "Normally, not even a rat can get past us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But you are no ordinary person. You possess special talents. I dare not judge. If you got in, you must have had a reason to."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ustabaşının tebessümü solarken bakışları astlarının üzerinde gezinir ve iç çeker.{/n} "Normalde bizim gözetimimizden bir fare bile kaçamaz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Ama siz sıradan değilsiniz, özel hünerleriniz var. Hüküm vermek bana düşmez. İçeri girebildiyseniz mutlaka haklı bir sebebiniz vardır."
